mods.tableOfContents: Sonata in A-flat major Op. 110: I. Moderato cantabile molto espressivo; II. Allegro molto; III. Adagio ma non troppo; Fuga (Allegro ma non troppo); L'istesso tempo di Arioso; L'istesso tempo di Fuga; Meno allegro / Ludwig Van Beethoven (1770-1827) -- Images - Premiére Série: I. Reflets dans l'eau (Reflections in the water); II. Hommage á Rameau; III. Mouvement / Claude Debussy (1862-1918) -- Sixiême Ordre: I. Les Moissonneurs (The Harvester); II. Les Langueurs-Tendres (Tender Languishing); III. La Gazouillement (The Twittering of the Birds); IV. La Bersan (dedicated to André Bauyn, Lord of Bersan); V. Les Baricades Mistérieuses (The Mysterious Barricades); VI. Les Bergeries (The Sheep Barns); VII. La Commére (Gossip); VIII. Le Moucheron (The Gnat) / François Couperin (1668-1733) -- My Favorite Things (from "The Sound of Music") / Richard Rogers (b. 1933), Piano transcription by Stephen Hough (b. 1961) -- El pelele (The puppet) / Enrique Granados (1867-1916)
